text: Monts-de-Randon is a commune in the Lozère department in southern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Rieutort-de-Randon (the seat), Estables, Saint-Amans, Servières and La Villedieu.Arrêté préfectoral 28 November 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Lozère department ==References== Category:Communes of Lozère Category:States and territories established in 2019
title: Monts-de-Randon
